tool_description: he "BinaryToHex API" is a straightforward and efficient conversion service that allows you to convert data between binary and hexadecimal formats. With this API, you can easily perform conversions to work with binary and hex data conveniently.
name: BinaryToHex API
title: BinaryToHex API

api_list.name: postSpeed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binarytohex-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binarytohex-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
